title: Transport of Ethernet Frames over Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol Version 3 (L2TPv3)
source: Layer Two Tunneling Protocol Extensions INT
abstract:
This document describes the transport of Ethernet frames over the Layer 2
Tunneling Protocol, Version 3 (L2TPv3).  This includes the transport of Ethernet
port-to-port frames as well as the transport of Ethernet VLAN frames.
The mechanism described in this document can be used in the creation
of Pseudowires to transport Ethernet frames over an IP network.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
